description:
"EAT BEAT DEADSPIKE-san" is a rhythm action game spin-off of the 2D-fighting game series, "BLAZBLUE", that features Dead Spike-san in an eating frenzy.

■How to Play
The controls are simple, tap the buttons to the beat and eat the incoming food! 
Enjoy the music of "BLAZBLUE" while having Dead Spike-san eat as much food as possible!

■Featuring a total of 20 playable songs!
There are 3 difficulties: "Easy", "Normal", or "Hard" for each of the songs.
Anyone can enjoy playing by choosing the appropriate difficulty.

■AWARD system for replayability!
A total of 14 objectives to challenge yourself!

Simple and interesting!
Groove to the rhythm and aim to achieve high calories(score)!
name: EAT BEAT DEADSPIKE-san
